# config/cache

## Signposting
- **Parent**: [config](../README.md)
- **Children**: [examples](examples/README.md)
- **Key Artifacts**: [Agent Guide](AGENTS.md), [Functional Spec](SPEC.md)

**Version**: v0.1.0 | **Status**: Active | **Last Updated**: January 2026

## Overview

Cache configuration templates for Codomyrmex. Provides centralized configuration for cache backends, TTL settings, and cache policies.

## Directory Contents

- `README.md` – This file
- `SPEC.md` – Functional specification
- `AGENTS.md` – Agent coordination documentation
- `backends.yaml` – Cache backend configurations
- `policies.yaml` – Cache eviction and TTL policies
- `examples/` – Example cache configs

## Navigation

- **Technical Documentation**: [AGENTS.md](AGENTS.md)
- **Functional Specification**: [SPEC.md](SPEC.md)
- **Examples**: [examples/](examples/README.md)
- **Parent Directory**: [config](../README.md)
